subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Heisman Trophy winner Ron Dayne of Wisconsin, the late Jerome Brown of Miami and LaDainian Tomlinson of Texas Christian University are on the final ballot for the College Football Hall of Fame for the first time.
snippet: The Heisman Trophy winner Ron Dayne of Wisconsin, the late Jerome Brown of Miami and LaDainian Tomlinson of Texas Christian University are on the final ballot for the College Football Hall of Fame for the first time.
